mapper.insert: insert into community(cm_email, cm_nick_name, cm_title, cm_content, cm_menu, cm_sido, cm_sigg, cm_emd) values(#{cmEmail}, #{cmNickName}, #{cmTitle}, #{cmContent}, #{cmMenu}, #{cmSido}, #{cmSigg}, #{cmEmd})
mapper.select: select * from community where cm_is_del = 'N' order by cm_bno desc
mapper.update: update community set cm_title = #{cmTitle}, cm_content = #{cmContent}, cm_menu = #{cmMenu}, cm_mod_at = now() where cm_bno = #{cmBno}
update community set cm_is_del = 'Y' where cm_bno = #{cmBno}
update community set cm_read_cnt = cm_read_cnt + #{cnt} where cm_bno = #{cmBno}
update community c set cm_cmt_cnt = (select count(cmt_bno) from community_cmt where cmt_bno = c.cm_bno and cmt_is_del = 'N') + (select count(re_bno) from community_re_cmt where re_bno = c.cm_bno)
update community set cm_like_cnt = cm_like_cnt + #{cnt} where cm_bno = #{cmBno}
update community c set cm_file_cnt = (select count(bno) from community_file where bno = c.cm_bno)
mapper.select: select count(cm_bno) from community where cm_is_del = 'N'
select count(cm_bno) from community where cm_is_del = 'N' and cm_menu = #{cmMenu}
select * from community where cm_is_del = 'N' order by cm_bno desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty}
select * from community where cm_is_del = 'N' and cm_menu = #{cmMenu} order by cm_bno desc limit #{pgvo.pageStart}, #{pgvo.qty}
select count(cm_bno) from community where cm_is_del = 'N'

choose.otherwise: AND (cm_title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR cm_nick_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR cm_email like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR cm_content like concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
